conference.title: Longhorn PHP 2019 CFP is open!
conference.summary: Longhorn PHP is back for another exciting weekend of fun and learning!
conference.content:
Longhorn PHP is back for another exciting weekend of fun and learning!
At Longhorn PHP you'll get to learn from and alongside a diverse group of developers from all over the region, country, and even the globe. The conference will consist of a tutorial day with in-depth workshops, followed by two main conference days with multiple tracks of traditional 1 hour sessions, and new 30 minute sessions! [Register now](https://www.longhornphp.com/register/) to take the next step toward leveling up your development career!
If you are interested in presenting at Longhorn PHP, [our CFP is open](https://cfp.longhornphp.com/) through December 15th, 2018.
**Dates:** May 2nd-4th, 2019
**Website:** <https://www.longhornphp.com>
